website_summaries.verdict: Do you struggle with smudging when you apply mascara to your bottom lashes? This Clinique mascara with its small brush designed for bottom lashes may be exactly what you need.
pros: This mascara features a small brush made especially for coating the hard-to-reach bottom lashes with less smears and smudges than typical applicators
Gripping brush does a good job defining even the smallest lashes
cons: Consistency is quite wet and feels somewhat sticky even after it dries
Bit of a learning curve to using the unique brush

customer_reviews.title: Glad to discover this...
customer_reviews.text: The brush size is perfect for bottoms lashes. No more struggling with the larger brush...all I need is a little color on my blonde (grey?) lashes...sample size mascara. When this runs out, I’ll clean the brush and use it with my regular mascara.
customer_reviews.author: sqfromsc

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate! Buy it! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Actually stays on until you take it off! It stays on during my 13 hour work days until I take it off at night. Makes me look so much more awake because the wind is small enough to grab all the tiny lower lashes... love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Seguin

customer_reviews.title: The size of the wand is great!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to see if i could work my bottom lashes but i found that because the wand is so small, i have so much more control and i actually use this as a first layer for my top lashes because for some reason, i am able to really pull up my lashes (kind of a curling effect) and don’t really need an eyelash curler. Only thing i kind of don’t like though is that it’s kind of weird when you remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mascara for shorter lashes
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect mascara for lower lashes and shorter lashes in corners of upper lid. It doesn't run or peal.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the mascara goes on as well as how easy it comes off when I wash my face at night. I’m glad I found this on amazon because the lady at the Clinique counter in Macy’s said they stopped carrying it. Really hoping there is more to buy since I really like this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara. My bottom lashes are pretty much non-existent, so finding a mascara that will work was difficult. This works great. Because it is for the bottom lashes, though, you may need to reapply throughout the day, b/c it will flake off if you are not careful. I do recommend it though - perfect for the bottom lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Gma

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I got this for applying to my lower lashes because I don’t ever apply mascara well to the lowers. I feel like I have healthy and full lashes yet this just smudged and caked. No help at all
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This product is certainly fantastic it give visibility to my bottom lashes for sure. Stays on all day and it is very easy to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Vannessa C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if product was dried up or what, but this was horrible. Biggest waste of twenty dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Bottom lash mascara
customer_reviews.text: Finally found bottom lash mascara will not get raccoon eyes. I will definitely purchase again. I recommended it to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again!!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised how good this product is!! Gives volume to the lower lashes without looking clumpy. Doesn’t smear or leave you with raccoon eyes at the end of the day. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: video ready

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Can be used as a base coat for top lashes too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked on this product! Never again will I use regular mascara on my lower lashes. No smudging at all and my lower lashes look great but not overly done!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hoppensack

customer_reviews.title: I am pretty clumsy with makeup and love this bottom lash mascara
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty clumsy with makeup and love this bottom lash mascara. The small wand makes a potentially easy job so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Lund

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! You can get the tiny lower lashes (mine are blonde and invisible)
customer_reviews.author: michele A lopez

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Artist recommendation
customer_reviews.text: The product is an exceptional value simply because it does what it is supposed to. Many mascaras don't catch the lashes and are barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Quill

customer_reviews.title: No more raccoon eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mascara that I can use on my bottom lashes and doesn't make me have raccoon eyes half way through the day. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky P.

customer_reviews.title: Essential beauty gear
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product to emphasize lower eyelashes as well as inner hard-to-reach corners.
customer_reviews.author: Double L in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: The BEST every lower lash mascara
customer_reviews.text: The BEST every lower lash mascara, only product on market that does not leave dots from mascara not drying properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for lower lash application....plan to reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No to have too much mascara on the brush.
customer_reviews.text: To put mascara on my lower lids. Once you learn the technique, it is easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Tiny brush makes application so easy. Does not smudge or flake off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best for bottom lashes!!
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is a must for bottom lashes! No More Raccoon Eyes! I will never use another mascara on my bottom lashes again... I have been using this mascara for 3 years now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best answer to mascara on the bottom lashes. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: wimsyjoy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mascara! I doesn't clump when applying, doesn't end up "under your eyes", even after 12 hours of wearing it, and washes off easily!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: The tiny applicator works exceptionally well on the lower lashes ...
customer_reviews.text: The tiny applicator works exceptionally well on the lower lashes, fully coating them with mascara and making them stand out. It does not smudge under the eyes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laneygirl

customer_reviews.title: This is a tiny mascara bottle/brush. Only intended for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a tiny mascara bottle/brush. Only intended for bottom lashes. Don't see the point in that. It's difficult to apply, it goes on clumpy and dries crumbly.
customer_reviews.author: Catie Purcell

customer_reviews.title: took a chance
customer_reviews.text: this mascara has a tiny brush for little lashes but the amount of mascara it holds is huge. I had to wipe some of it off every time I went to use it. that being said I would buy it again IF it came in a true brown color(I purchased black). lost most of my lashes to chemo and they never returned to their former fullness. I understand the concept of using it for tiny lashes but wish there was a way to keep it from clumping on the wand.
customer_reviews.author: L. silks

customer_reviews.title: Gets those invisible bottom lashes
customer_reviews.text: who knew there was a mascara for those tiny lashes you can't even see. I think it's just the brush that makes the difference but it covers every lash and there is no clumping or sticking together.
customer_reviews.author: liberty

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara out there if you’re looking for noticeable lashes ...
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara out there if you’re looking for noticeable lashes but not tarantula eyes. I use for both top and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: anne kelly

customer_reviews.title: My go to
customer_reviews.text: I love this lower lash mascara - have been a customer for years. I usually purchase at Macy's direct from the Clinique counter but found this at a good price and quick shipping. Same quality as the department store and delivered to my home. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C.Shelton

customer_reviews.title: A game changer for shaky hands
customer_reviews.text: I have essential tremors so my hands shake a lot. Putting on mascara was becoming very difficult without making a terrible mess. I found Clinique’s Bottom Lash Mascara with it’s tiny applicator and it’s made a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: fillyok

customer_reviews.title: Will use forever
customer_reviews.text: Loved this ! Never heard of until I went to Boscovs one day and the sales lady showed me. Really helps to open my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Hannavas

customer_reviews.title: No smudges under eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lower lash mascara I have found. It is easy to apply and does not smudge under the eye area. I ordered 3 during a recent sale and I am keeping them for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Shea aitken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara for lower and corner lashes! Doesn't smudge and the wand is perfect for separating and coloring small lashes
customer_reviews.author: Barb49

customer_reviews.title: This mascara is AMAZING for lower lashes
customer_reviews.text: Yeeessss! This mascara is AMAZING for lower lashes! Coats every lash, even the smallest ones....and DOES NOT SMUDGE onto your skin/lids! This is my new favorite product. A must have for small sparse lower lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Ancelan mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush for lower lashes but clumps.
customer_reviews.text: Was not worth the price. Clumps on the lashes. Brush is nice. I use it with my favorite mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bottom lashes.
customer_reviews.text: I have looked every where for mascara like this. It has a tiny brush to get tiny lower lashes. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this!!
customer_reviews.text: I will say this product is one of those things I didn’t know I couldn’t live without, until I got it! The tiny brush makes it easy to get coverage on even the smallest bottom lashes and the formula is thick and goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kinkade

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mascara. Never smudges and coats even the tiniest bottom lashes
customer_reviews.author: minired65

customer_reviews.title: Used for years
customer_reviews.text: Online cost much less than in store..... daughter and I use for lashed, though it is intended for lower lashes...... luv it.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ann

customer_reviews.title: It’s TINY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh maaaaaaan!!! I paid $18 for THIS??? I thought I was buying a mascara for humans!! Not for fairies 😬😬😬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good lower lash mascara ...
customer_reviews.text: This came partially dried out and was a mess to try and apply to bottom lashes!! Just grab Maybelline's skinny mascara and it works MUCH better!
customer_reviews.author: J Silampa

customer_reviews.title: Great for my bottom lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Didn't know it was that small tho lol but it definitely gets all of your bottom lashes! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Teka515

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer using mascara on my lower lashes but most mascara was too thick. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Good mascara, great tiny brush for bottom lashes
customer_reviews.text: I buy these often, glad I can purchase on Amazon and not have to go to the store
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's not waterproof. By mid morning it was rolling down my cheeks. One star because I love the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your collection
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The little brush in this is the bomb dot com lol. So easy to apply to your bottom lashes without making a complete mess
customer_reviews.author: Sunny P

customer_reviews.title: Best Bottom Lash Mascara EVER
customer_reviews.text: Makes my bottom lashes separate and look beautiful. I love it when I'm wearing falsies.
customer_reviews.author: KiaraPereyra

customer_reviews.title: Could have earned 5 stras, but...
customer_reviews.text: This tiny wand is just the perfect thing for bottom lashes and it does not smear. The only thing that bothered me (and wasn't mentioned anywhere) is that it's a pain to take off. No, it's not water resistant but a TUBE MASCARA, which means a mess! It breaks down to tiny pieces, so I had to use a cotton round and toner to "catch" all the tubes. For a contacts wearer with sensitive eyes, this becomes a chore. Sooooo annoying!
customer_reviews.author: A. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I personally wish that the brush was a tad bigger. I would always accidentally get the product on my water line. Not a very pleasant feeling. Amazon did a great job with the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Libby G

customer_reviews.title: Not really any easier than my full size brush
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't Spend the money as the smaller tube makes it more challenging to handle vs. my regular size mascara
customer_reviews.author: WSL

product_meta.title: Clinique Clinique bottom lash mascara - #01 black, 0.07oz, 0.07 Ounce
product_meta.description: This mascara features a specifically designed brush. Effectively coats the bottom tiniest lashes. Advanced formula fights against pesky smears. Leaves your eyes looking perfectly big and bright. Easy to be removed with warm water
feature_bullets: This mascara features a specifically designed brush
Effectively coats the bottom tiniest lashes
Leaves your eyes looking perfectly big and bright

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
